title: error while starting the app
body:
I get this error , and then the browser hangs.

> runApp()

Listening on http://127.0.0.1:3331
Warning: Error in setwd: character argument expected
  73: setwd
  72: observeEventHandler [/home/amit/Downloads/ChIPdig-master/server.R#172]
   1: runApp
Warning: Error in setwd: character argument expected
  73: setwd
  72: observeEventHandler [/home/amit/Downloads/ChIPdig-master/server.R#172]
   1: runApp

Kindly let me know where I am doing things wrongly?
